https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eBiukejUOiY8qanlR2dxPFgxdA0.jpg The first American independent drama to take viewers inside the Armenian Community of Los Angeles: Suddenly uprooted from his home, 12 year-old Armenian boy, Aram, is sent to live with his Grandfather in America where he struggles to navigate the clash between old-world values and new-school Armenian identity in Little Armenia.
